void org.pdfclown.objects.PdfObjectWrapper.CheckCompatibility ( object  feature  )  [protected, inherited]

Checks whether the specified feature is compatible with the document's conformance version.

Parameters:
feature Entity whose compatibility has to be checked. Supported types:

  • VersionEnum
  • Property name resolvable to an annotated getter method
  • MemberInfo

In case of 

null

, this method tries to retrieve the caller method's compatibility version.

bool org.pdfclown.objects.PdfObjectWrapper.Delete (  )  [inherited]

Removes the object from its document context.

The object is no more usable after this method returns.

Returns:
Whether the object was actually decontextualized (only indirect objects can be decontextualize).

Property Documentation

virtual PdfDirectObject org.pdfclown.objects.PdfObjectWrapper.BaseObject [get, set, inherited]

Gets the underlying reference object, if available; otherwise, behaves like BaseDataObject.

PdfIndirectObject org.pdfclown.objects.PdfObjectWrapper.Container [get, set, inherited]

Gets the indirect object containing the base object.

It's used for update purposes.

JavaScript org.pdfclown.documents.interaction.forms.FieldActions.OnCalculate [get, set]

Gets/Sets a JavaScript action to be performed to recalculate the value of this field when that of another field changes.

JavaScript org.pdfclown.documents.interaction.forms.FieldActions.OnChange [get, set]

Gets/Sets a JavaScript action to be performed when the user types a keystroke into a text field or combo box or modifies the selection in a scrollable list box.

JavaScript org.pdfclown.documents.interaction.forms.FieldActions.OnFormat [get, set]

Gets/Sets a JavaScript action to be performed before the field is formatted to display its current value.

This action can modify the field's value before formatting.

JavaScript org.pdfclown.documents.interaction.forms.FieldActions.OnValidate [get, set]

Gets/Sets a JavaScript action to be performed when the field's value is changed.

This action can check the new value for validity.
